titleStmt.title: Lac puero[rum]. M. holti mylke for chyldren
titleStmt.author: Holte, John, grammarian.
More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Wynkyn de worde, in Fletestrete in the sygne of the sonne,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Includes two epigrams by Sir Thomas More.
In this edition the 95mm. textura types have normal w² --STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Fletestrete in the sygne of the sonne
